detailed_description: Interior/exterior paint offering corrosion/resistance, excellent adhesion, mildew resistance, chemical resistance, durable finish; available in eggshell and semi-gloss. Suitable for fences, railings, doors, garage doors, drywall, concrete.
features: Corrosion & rust resistant, durable hard finish, excellent adhesion, chemical resistant, mildew-resistant finish, low VOC, easy clean-up, tintable
